text.value: Keep up to date with the latest improvements in ToolJet!

options.code:
return queries.getReleaseNoteswithFilter.data
  .filter((e) =>
    (components.includeBetaVersionsToggle.value || e.lts_release_tag) &&
    (!components.selfHostedSearch.value ||
      e.title.toLowerCase().includes(components.selfHostedSearch.value.toLowerCase()) ||
      e.description.toLowerCase().includes(components.selfHostedSearch.value.toLowerCase())) &&
    e.is_self_hosted &&
    (!components.selfHostedCategoryDropdown.values.length || 
      (e.release_category && 
        (
          // If the release contains "Bug Fix" category, only show it if "Bug Fix" is selected in the dropdown
          (e.release_category.toLowerCase().includes("bug fix") && 
           components.selfHostedCategoryDropdown.values.some(v => v.toLowerCase() === "bug fix")) ||
          // For releases without "Bug Fix" category, show if any selected category matches
          (!e.release_category.toLowerCase().includes("bug fix") &&
           components.selfHostedCategoryDropdown.values.some(category =>
             e.release_category.toLowerCase().split(',').map(s => s.trim()).includes(category.toLowerCase())
           ))
        )
      )) && 
    queries.versionInBetween.data.includes(e.tag || e.lts_release_tag)
  )
  .sort((a, b) =>
    moment(b.published_date_sh, 'DD/MM/YYYY') - moment(a.published_date_sh, 'DD/MM/YYYY')
  )
